#summary How to install
#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy

= Installation on Wordpress =

 # Download theme file from the [http://code.google.com/p/shailan-theme-framework/downloads/list downloads page].
 # Go to your WP Admin Dashboar, select `Appearance -> Themes`.
 # On themes page click `Install themes`.
 # Click on `Upload`.
 # Select the file you just downloaded.
 # Upload and activate.

= Setting Up = 

  After theme is installed, you will need to set up some options for it to work as you expected.
  To set up your theme visit `Appearance->Theme Options` page.
